{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: '(A new model of mechanoid guard appears behind Nat) I cannot believe you were able to find an opening...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "(The key successfully unlocks the door of the chamber) ...I'll clear the obstacles. Everyone, charge!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'If you think you can get out this way...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'I will be very disappointed.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Royal Guard', 3: 'By the order of the Queen! Activate complete lockdown!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Royal Guard', 3: '(Tears the traitorous mechanoid in half) Malfunctioned guard neutralized.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'Commandant, you are no fool...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'You know what you have to do if you want to live.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'My royal guards... remove these Constructs.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "(Blocks a rivet coming for you) Commandant, you'll be alright. I've got you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "We have to form a line of defense around the commandant! That's our best option!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "No one's hurting the commandant when Nanami is here! Hmph!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "We can't just keep defending! We have to move as we fight!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We can't let any harm come to the commandant!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Do we have to worry about Kamui?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...None of my comms requests have gone through. I'll keep trying.", 4: '1'}
